parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns shown text in the item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvText]] [idc, path]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, path]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Array containing numbers.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> control [[tvText]] path

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name> p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvText]] [101, [0]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[tvText]] [0,0,0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvValue]], [[tvSetText]]
</value></part></template>
